## Overview

The goal of `{goodpracticestools}` is to allows the person generating the overview *"Summary of Best Practices in Cantonal Action Programs"* by Promotion Sant√© Suisse" to enrich it with predefined analytical elements (charts, text, etc.).

```{r, echo=FALSE, out.width="70%", fig.align='center'}
knitr::include_graphics("man/figures/overview.png")
```


## Installation

You can install `{goodpracticestools}` from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("promotionsante/goodpracticestools")
```
